import AccountHeader from "../Header"; import AccountSideBar from "../../../components/AccountSideBar"; import AccountNavBar from "../../../components/AccountNavBar"; import { Arrow } from "../Home"; import { ChevronRightIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import { t } from 'i18next'; import './style.css'; export default function PersonalInfo() { const obj = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')); const email = obj[0].email; const firstName = obj[0].firstName; const lastName = obj[0].lastName; const gender = obj[0].gender; const dateOfBirth = obj[0].dateOfBirth; const password = obj[0].password; return ( <> {t("my-account.personal-info.personal_info")}
) } const Heading = () => ( <>
{t("my-account.personal-info.personal_info")}
{t("my-account.personal-info.subheading")}
) const Card = () => (
Your profile information in Google services
Personal information and options to manage it. You can make some of this info, like your contact details, visible to others so they can reach you easily. You can also see a summary of your profiles.
) const BasicInfo = ({ firstName, lastName, dateOfBirth, gender }) => (
Basic information
Some information may be visible to other people using Google services.  More information
) const ContactInfo = ({ email, ChevronRightIcon }) => (
Contact information
) const Card2 = () => (
Other information and preferences for Google services
Ways to verify it's you and settings for the Web.
) const PasswordInfo = ({ password }) => (
Password
A secure password helps protect your Google Account
)
